page.title: 12BICKLEIGH'S SOCIAL CALENDAR
page.content: Special social events take place throughout the year in the village. A typical year is as follows: January: Bell Ringers Whist Drive March: Mothering Sunday Service - posies of primroses and violets for mothers April: Easter church services May: Bank Holiday Street Market June: Vicar hosts Church Gift Day July: Outings for Bell Ringers and Sunday School September: Harvest Festival Service followed by Sports and Tea October: Church Bazaar November: Men's Club Whist Drive December: Christmas Fairs for School and Village Hall; Carol Singers tour area; Christmas Eve Candlelight Service.
